hymn.title: Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth

layout.singingstanza: Let him kiss me with the kiss -- es of his mouth! For your love is bet -- ter than wine. Your name is like oint -- ment poured forth; There -- fore the vir -- gins love you. The king brought me, brought me in -- to his cham -- bers— We'll be glad and joy in you; We'll ex -- tol your love much more than wine. Draw me; we will run af -- ter you. Tell me, you whom my soul loves, Where do you feed your flock? Where do they lie down at noon? Where do you pas -- ture your flock? If you your -- self do not know, Go by the flock's foot -- steps, Feed your young, O fair -- est one, By the shep -- herds' tents.

lyrics.stanza: Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth! For your love is better than wine. Your name is like ointment poured forth; Therefore the virgins love you.
Tell me, you whom my soul loves, Where do you feed your flock? Where do they lie down at noon? Where do you pasture your flock?
If you yourself do not know, Go by the flock's footsteps, Feed your young, O fairest one, By the shepherds' tents.
